titles.title: FEMA Reauthorization Act of 2013
Integrated Public Alert and Warning System Modernization Act of 2013
To reauthorize the programs and activities of the Federal Emergency Management Agency.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
